Package com.view

Interface PassiveView

All Superinterfaces:
View
All Known Implementing Classes:
CommandLineView
public interface PassiveView
extends View
The interface Passive View. All Controller can have as many passive view as wanted. A passive view display the game state but doesn't take any player entry.
